nodes.text: Aargau was an astronomical object located in the galaxy's Core Worlds, in grid square L-10 on the Standard Galactic Grid, that was headquarters of the Bank of Aargau.

Aargau was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Ultimate Star Wars, a reference book written by Patricia Barr, Adam Bray, Daniel Wallace, and Ryder Windham and released on April 28, 2015. It was originally created for Star Wars 48, the forty-eighth issue of Marvel Comics' earlier Legends Star Wars comic series, which was first published on March 24, 1981.
